text: khaṇḍita, ‘saphā’ mattu ‘marvaḥ’gaḷu allāhana saṅkētagaḷa sālige sērive. Allāhana bhavanada ‘hajj’ (kaḍḍāya yātre) athavā ‘umraḥ’ (aicchika yātre) naḍesuvavanu averaḍara naḍuve naḍeyuvudaralli tappilla. Sva'iccheyinda oḷitannu māḍa horaṭavanu (tiḷidirali); allāhanu (oḷitina) praśansakanū jñāniyū āgiddāne
